item.title: Positive correlation between extent of fire incident, estimated loss and number of responding firefighters
item.description: Abstract This post analyzed the impact of extent of fire incidents on both economic loss and the number of firefighter responded. As well as correlation between loss and number of firefighters just for demonstration of the role of extent of fire between them Introduction "Fire Incidents Data" is a dataset published by the TFS, Toronto Fire Services, containing 17536 observations of fire incidents defined by the Ontario Fire Marshal.
